name: Dungeon Crawler (itch) (Dermond)
description:
Dungeon Crawler -Game-

This is a little Game (prototype) I created over the last 2 weeks. It is inspired by games like the old Top down The legend of Zelda. The dungeon is procedural generated and different everytime. The goal is to find the key taken by one of the dungeons mechanical guardians. 
Character based on the OC Kaida from artsy_aori. Check her out @ https://www.instagram.com/artsy_aori/
